titles.home: RustFS - High-Performance Distributed Storage System Built with Rust
titles.about: About RustFS - Open Source Distributed Storage Solution

descriptions.home: RustFS is a high-performance, unlimited scaling, secure and reliable distributed storage system built with Rust, S3 protocol compatible, supporting multi-cloud storage.
descriptions.download: Download RustFS, supporting Docker, Linux, macOS, Windows and other platforms, quickly deploy your distributed storage system.
descriptions.features: Learn about RustFS core features: high performance, unlimited scaling, multi-cloud support, S3 compatibility, open source and more.
descriptions.about: RustFS is a trusted open source distributed storage solution with over 1500+ software protocol compatibility adaptations.

hero.description: RustFS is developed with the popular and secure Rust language, compatible with S3 protocol. Suitable for AI/ML, massive data storage, big data, internet, industrial and confidential storage scenarios. Nearly free to use. Follows Apache 2 license, supports domestic confidential devices and systems.
hero.subtitle: Trusted open-source software with over 1500+ software protocol compatibility adaptations
